title: Ligustinus (lacus)
description: The so-called Guadalquivir Marshes (Marismas del Guadalquivir) are a region of wetlands located on the lower Guadalquivir River. In antiquity these wetlands included a lagoon and an estuary known as Lacus Ligustinus. Silting gradually transformed the lake into wetlands.

properties.description: Representative modern location based on polygonal geometry derived from an OpenStreetMap way that outlines an area of the Guadalquivir Marshes.
properties.title: OSM location of modern Guadalquivir Marshes
